titleStmt.title: A letter from Gen. Monck to King Charls son of the late King Charls of England deceased together with King Charls his answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II). King Charles his answer thereunto.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
